Package actions

Class Summary
Action A Bullet in board action.
AddUserAction An AddUserAction adds a new set of user credentials to the bulletin board.
CommandsAction A Commands action simply provides all available commands to the user.
CreateAction A Create action creates a new topic.
DeleteMessageAction A DeleteMessage action deletes a message by index..
DeleteTopicAction A Delete Topic action removes a topic from the bulletin board.
ListUsersAction A ListUsersAction returns a list of all currently logged in users.
LoginAction A LoginAction attempts to login with a username, password combo
LogoutAction A logout action logs out a currently logged in user.
PostAction A Post action attempts to create a post from the current user to the currently selected message board.
ReadAction A read action returns a complete list of all posts in a topic.
SetAction A set action sets the currently selected topic.
TopicsAction A TopicsAction returns a list of all topics on the Bulletin board.
